caption: Really good service, relaxing place. Would reccomend checking it out

I make it a habit to come to black & silver. Jonathan, the barista, is absolutely awesome. He’s super passionate about his job, and always is up for great conversation. If you’re in silver spring, stop by, you’re in for a treat!
The cappuccino was superb and I love the atmosphere!
Excellent coffee! Great atmosphere and great service. I'll definitely make this a regular stop throughout my week.
Jonathan makes the best oat milk vanilla lattes. He knows everything about coffee down to the smallest details and makes every drink so carefully. One of the best coffees in town.

So excited about the coffee here! I’m a black coffee kind of gal and it’s seriously delicious and smooth. On top of that they have expertly crafted lattes and espresso drinks....don’t even get me started on the fresh croissants and yummy everything bagels. Jonathan is an excellent barista and service is amazing and super friendly! Best way to start the morning ☕️

Next to the Silver Spring metro station, Black & Silver is a unique coffee shop hidden inside the popular Silver Branch Brewery. While they open at 7am, the party starts at 8 when the fresh croissants come out the oven. On the menu, you’ll find a variety of traditional styled coffees made plain, or sweetened with one of their homemade syrups. The baristas craft their drinks with precision and passion, and the small staff on hand treat every guest as family. I seriously recommend taking a minute during the morning rush to sit down and have a vanilla bean latte, glass of sparkling water, and a fresh toasted bagel. You’ll immediately have a new morning routine!
Jonathan makes the best lattes and is super knowledgeable about the beans they serve. Great service, great coffee. They offer to-go as well, which is convenient on the way to the metro.
